quotes.text: Zindagi jeene ka maza tab aata hai jab apni soch par yakeen hota hai.
Kal kisne dekha? Aaj mehnat karo.
Radhe Radhe! Bas itna hi kaafi hai mann ko shaant rakhne ke liye.
Jo waqt ki kadar karta hai, waqt usko kabhi girne nahi deta.
Kaamyabi ek din me nahi milti, par ek din zaroor milti hai.
Krishna se bada koi dost nahi, bas samarpan chahiye.
Muskurate rehna ek kala hai, har koi nahi seekh pata.
Sapne tabhi pure hote hain jab unke liye neend tyaag do.
Radha naam lene se hi mann halka ho jata hai.
Har subah ek naya mauka hota hai.
Focus utna hi rakho jitna target tak pahunchne me madad mile.
Krishna ki rehmat jab saath ho to mushkilein bhi raaste de deti hain.
Zindagi chhoti nahi, bas log use waste kar dete hain.
Haar se darna mat, haar hi to jeet ki pehli seedhi hai.
Jahan Shyam ka naam hota hai, wahan prem apne aap aa jata hai.
Sachchi zindagi wahi hai jahan shanti ho, shor nahi.
Aaj ka dard, kal ki taqat ban jata hai.
Radhe Krishna ka jaap karo, mann apne aap saaf ho jayega.
Jo log dil se nikal jaate hain, unki yaadein kabhi nahi jaati.
Lagatar mehnat hi asli talent hota hai.
Preet Radha ki, sharan Krishna ki — isse bada sukh nahi.
Gussa kam, samajh zyada rakho.
Aaj thoda mushkil hai, kal asaan ho jayega.
Mann jaise hi Shyam me lagta hai, sab dard door ho jaate hain.
Sach bolna mushkil hota hai, par sukoon deta hai.
Akele hi chalna padta hai, tabhi log pehchante hain.

Har raat ke baad subah hoti hi hai.
Hardwork itna karo ki success bhi impress ho jaye.
Radhe Radhe kahne se hi vibraation badal jati hai.
Jo log aapke saath hain, unki kadar zaroor karein.
Aaj se behtar kal banane ka iraada rakho.

Jo tumhara nahi, wo kabhi rukta nahi.

Haar ka matlab khatam nahi — shuruat hoti hai.

Log badalte nahi, bas asli chehra dikh jata hai.
Mujhe tumhari aadat nahi, zarurat ho gayi hai.

Ek tum ho jo kabhi samajh hi nahi paaye.
